class.name: EditorSpinSlider
class.brief_description: Godot editor's control for editing numeric values.
class.description: This [Control] node is used in the editor's Inspector dock to allow editing of numeric values. Can be used with [EditorInspectorPlugin] to recreate the same behavior.

members.member: The suffix to display after the value (in a faded color). This should generally be a plural word. You may have to use an abbreviation if the suffix is too long to be displayed.
